value:
A big family of Heroes, caring and
watching out for one another. How
nauseating.

I am Lady Edelgard's humble servant.
I serve you for now, but my true
loyalties lie with her. Don't forget it.

You like watching from afar as others
spill blood on your behalf. You and
the goddess have that in common.

Some say I'm a rat—always conniving
in the shadows. Perhaps so. But I'm
not the only rat around here.

I have been analyzing the enemy's
weak points so we can exploit them.
I will give you a report shortly.

I come bearing well wishes on your
friend's behalf. Please tell your friend
I have more important things to do.
Any experience is worth having.

This strength will serve Lady
Edelgard well!
This is harder than expected.
Heh, this suits me well.

I am Hubert, heir to House Vestra
and future minister to the emperor.
Pleased to make your acquaintance.

You have a useful talent for expelling
enemies from the world of the living.
I find it charming.$k$pProvided you held no ill will toward
Lady Edelgard, I would consider
inviting you to join me in the Empire.$k$pOf course, I cannot allow a personal
attachment to compromise my
devotion to Lady Edelgard.$k$pI am sworn eternally and irrevocably
to her service. However...$k$pIf there existed a version of me who
had never thus pledged himself,
he may have offered his life to you.
ぬああっ！
屑が
ぐふっ！
この程度！
I have no need of you.
Watch how weak you are!
Mwahahaha!
Just a bug to squash.
Rendered useless...forgive me...
His normal chuckle
You are doing quite well. I mean that.
Did you just attempt something? I advise against that.
Should I cut you down now? I am kidding, of course.
House Vestra operates in the shadows, not the front lines.
Until my last breath, my loyalty lies with Lady Edelgard.
Such a state of affairs would strike fear in even a god... Hm? It is nothing.
You have proven yourself worthy of leading me. Do as you will.
So be it.
Is that so?
I am prepared.
